name: 2D platformer (Antoon)
description:
What to do?

Move through the levels and find all coins during the four short levels.
Will you find them all?

Why was it made?

This game is a simple platformer made in a month. Inspired by a tutorial of Brackeys.

Keybindings
  • Use Q and D, or the arrow keys to move.
  • Space to jump
  • Click on the box with the mouse to pick it up
